msbt.message: Ohmigosh! The prezzie you sent? SO. FAB.
OHMIGOSH! Your prezzie was, like, THE best!
Thanks for the prezzie! I teared up. Just a little. OK. A lot a little. A lot.
I'm all happy! Why? Because you sent me an amazing prezzie!
That gift's as cool as my future stage show's pyrotechnics!
Letters are the bestâ€”they're like mini autobiographies. Never miss the chance to write your story!
I spritzed this letter with the new scent from my home-brew perfume, "Sparkle Boss"! Hope you like it!
After reading it, I went out to stare at the moon and think about how I'll headline the first lunar concert.
Well, thanks for the fan mail! (That's what I call all the letters I get. It's practice for real fan mail.)
Your note has me thinking about more stuff than I have space to write. We should catch up!
Let's get some coffee and chat!
